ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Portal sahibi' literally translates to 'Portal owner', it's not the most natural or commonly used translation for 'Owner' in a general context. 'Sahibi' implies ownership of a specific portal, while 'Owner' can mean owner of anything.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Sahibi' (owner) or 'Malik' (possessor) as a more general translation, depending on the specific context.
